title: Corporate Bank is number 1 in Germany
body:
Deutsche Bank has "returned to the summit of corporate banks" according to the Banking Survey 2023 from German magazine FINANCE. The industry survey on corporate banking received 191 responses from employees in the finance departments of companies in Germany. Most respondents hold senior positions and 70 percent work for companies with an annual turnover of 250 million euros or more.
Deutsche Bank came first in the following categories:
Best bank in corporate banking
Best advice on ECM/IPO
Best advice on bond placements
Best trade and export finance
Leading in digitization (together with Commerzbank)
"The award shows that we are on the right track in the Corporate Bank and also in our cooperation with the Investment Bank. Our investments around the world allow us to more closely and effectively accompany our clients’ global activities,” said Jan-Philipp Gillmann, Head of Europe and Global Head of Corporate Coverage, Corporate Bank. “Clients appreciate our Global Hausbank model, which we live day-to-day.”
